feed.title: ShinyTracker
feed.subtitle: Lists and displays detected changes on the RSI "Progress Tracker"

entry.title: Progress Tracker Delta - 2024-10-30
entry.summary: Progress Tracker Delta 558 deliverables listed | 2024-08-21 => 2024-10-30 There were 4 modifications, 0 removals, and 51 additions in this update. Please note that not all removals are intentional; there is currently a bug with how time is entered on the Progress Tracker that can cause deliverables to disappear.

entry.title: Scheduled Deliverables - 2024-10-30
entry.summary: There are currently 18 scheduled deliverables being worked on by 9 teams
